Disharmony of the ying and wei levels: feverish sensations, spontaneous sweating, aversion to wind, thin white tongue coating, floating moderate pulse.

composition.name: Huang Qi
composition.function: Tonifica el Qi y eleva el Yang

actions: Releases the exterior with acrid and cold herbs
indications: Fever, common cold, influenza
clinicalManifestations: Exterior-excess, wind-cold syndrome: aversion to cold, fever, headache, neck stiffness, body aches and pains, absence of perspiration, dyspnea, a thin, white tongue coating, and a superficial, tight pulse
contraindications: Individuals with ulceration, abscesses and sores; lin zheng; and patients with bleeding or excessive bleeding on the verge of collapse
cautions: Elderly patients and individuals with generalized weakness
pharmacologicalEffects: Effect on temperature regulation, antitussive, antibiotic, cardiovascular, radioprotective
research: Fever, upper respiratory tract infection, cough, peripheral neuropathy, enuresis, mastitis

contraindications: {"Exceso de calor","Estancamiento de alimentos","Estancamiento de Qi"}
